name: Space Trooper
description:
Fun platformer where you can switch from side view to 3D behind the player!

An every growing number of levels with obstacles, enemies and puzzles.

Get Power-Ups to restore health, gain lives and .... power-up!

Every level is timed, with a total game time - can you do better?

What's Happening Now?

Adding more levels! More obstacles! More power-ups! More enemy types!

The game mechanics are mostly there, but now I'm asking for ideas and feedback.

Please get involved and use the Discussion Board! :)
